editorialDecl.p: The published edition from which this e-text was transcribed is printed in the Devanāgarī script. The electronic text below is in a lossless transliteration using the Latin alphabet. The transliteration scheme used is the IAST (The International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration). IAST differs in small ways from ISO 15919, but is preferred by most working Sanskrit scholars. Conversion of this file to ISO 15919 can be achieved by performing the following replacements throughout the file: ṛ -> r̥ and ṃ -> ṁ
Word division is with spaces, not as Devanāgarī ("ity evam" not "ityevam".)

The ampersand (&) was used by the inputters as an anchor to mark places in the e-text where the printed edition has a footnote, and again with the text of the related footnote being placed nearby in the e-text. I have regularized these footnotes in many, but not all, cases, changing them to notes. The use of the ampersand may still be irregular in places, and needs to be checked against the edition, and some notes have been omitted and need to be added from the edition.
The notes by Trivikramātmaja Ācārya are included in the e-text . using the note element.

segmentation.p: Speakers are marked as paragraphs. All other pieces of text are marked as lines (of verse).

div.head: Prathamaḥ paṭalaḥ
div.l: yasmin sarvaṃ yataḥ sarvaṃ | yaḥ sarvaṃ sarvataś ca yaḥ |
yaś ca sarvamayo nityaṃ | tasmai sarvātmane namaḥ || (RA_1.1)
yadi te 'ham anugrāhyā | yadyahaṃ tava vallabhā || (RA_1.5)
sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā devi | bhaktānāṃ hitakāmyayā || (RA_1.7)
piṇḍapāte ca yo mokṣaḥ | sa ca mokṣo nirarthakaḥ |
piṇḍe tu patite devi | gardabho 'pi vimucyate || (RA_1.9)
yadi muktirbhagakṣobhe | kiṃ na muñcanti gardabhāḥ |
ajāś ca vṛṣabhāścaiva | kiṃna muktā gaṇāmbike || (RA_1.10)
akathyam api deveśi | sadbhāvaṃ kathayāmi te || (RA_1.13)
śūnyapāpo mantrayājī | na piṇḍaṃ dhārayet kvacit |
dharme naṣṭe kuto dharmaḥ | dharme naṣṭe kutaḥ kriyā || (RA_1.15)
kriyānaṣṭe kuto yogaḥ | yoge naṣṭe kuto gatiḥ |
gatinaṣṭe kuto mokṣo | mokṣe naṣṭe na kiṃcana || (RA_1.16)
tatpratyupāyaṃ me brūhi | yadyasti karuṇā mayi || (RA_1.17)
rasaś ca pavanaśceti | karmayogo dvidhā mataḥ || (RA_1.18)
mūrchito harati vyādhiṃ | mṛto jīvayati svayam |
baddhaḥ khecaratāṃ kuryāt | raso vāyuś ca bhairavi || (RA_1.19)
tatra devi sthiraṃ piṇḍaṃ | yatra sthairye rasaḥ prabhuḥ || (RA_1.20)
satyaṃ sa labhate devi | jñānaṃ vijñānapūrvakam |
tasya mantrāś ca sidhyanti | yo 'śnāti mṛtasūtakam || (RA_1.22)
yāvanna śaktipātas tu | na yāvat pāśakṛntanam |
na sidhyati raso devi | pibanti mṛgatṛṣṇikām || (RA_1.25)
na garbhaḥ sampradāyārthe | raso garbho vidhīyate |
tenāyaṃ labhate siddhiṃ | na siddhiḥ sūtakaṃ vinā || (RA_1.27)
yāvanna harabījaṃ tu | bhakṣayet pāradaṃ rasam |
tāvattasya kuto muktiḥ | kutaḥ piṇḍasya dhāraṇam || (RA_1.28)
jalpanti ca vayaṃ muktā | yāsyāmaḥ śivamandiram || (RA_1.29)
svadehe khecaratvaṃ ca | śivatvaṃ yena labhyate |
tādṛśe tu rasajñāne | nityābhyāsaṃ kuru priye || (RA_1.31)
tvaṃ mātā sarvabhūtānāṃ | pitā cāhaṃ sanātanaḥ |
dvayoś ca yo raso devi | mahāmaithunasambhavaḥ || (RA_1.34)
pārado gadito yaś ca | parārthaṃ sādhakottamaiḥ || (RA_1.35)
pūjanāc ca pradānāc ca | dṛśyate ṣaḍvidhaṃ phalam || (RA_1.37)
kedārādīni liṅgāni | pṛthivyā yāni kāni ca |
tāni dṛṣṭvā tu yatpuṇyaṃ | tatpuṇyaṃ rasadarśanāt || (RA_1.38)
adhamaḥ khagavādas tu | vilavādas tu madhyamaḥ |
āstike tu bhavetsiddhiḥ | tasya sidhyati bhūtale || (RA_1.47)
tasya nāsti priye siddhir | janmakoṭiśatair api || (RA_1.48)
nāhaṃ trātā bhave tasya | janmakoṭiśatair api || (RA_1.49)
gurusevāṃ vinā karma | yaḥ kuryān mūḍhacetanaḥ |
sa yāti niṣphalaṃ karma | svapnalabdhaṃ dhanaṃ yathā || (RA_1.55)
yaḥ karma kurute dṛṣṭaṃ | tasya lābhaḥ pade pade |
kārayed rasavādaṃ tu | tuṣṭena guruṇā priye || (RA_1.56)
anujñātaś ca guruṇā | labdhvā cājñāṃ rasāṅkuśīm |
tan mam ācakṣva deveśi | kim anyac chrotum icchasi || (RA_1.60)
rasopadeśadātā ca | kathaṃ syādvada me prabho |
dharmajñaḥ satyavāk dakṣaḥ | śīlavān guṇavān śuciḥ || (RA_2.3)
rañjanaṃ sāraṇaṃ tailaṃ | dalāni krāmaṇāni ca || (RA_2.5)
khecarīṃ bhūcarīṃ caiva | yo vetti sa gururmataḥ || (RA_2.6)
karair adhiṣṭhitā devi | yojyās te nidhisādhane || (RA_2.9)
śūrāś ca kṛtavidyāś ca | praśastāḥ sādhakāḥ priye || (RA_2.13)
bahvāśinī ca duścittā | koṭarākṣī ca nirdayā |
rasanindākarī yā ca | tāṃ nārīṃ parivarjayet || (RA_2.15)
kṛṣṇapakṣe ṛtumatī | sā nārī kākiṇī smṛtā || (RA_2.17)
ubhayapakṣe ṛtumatī | sā nārī kīkaṇī matā || (RA_2.18)
sūkṣmakeśā tu yā nārī | kṣīrāhārapriyā sadā || (RA_2.20)
yasyāḥ payodharau devi | tuṅgapīnau samāv ubhau || (RA_2.22)
śyāmā ca madhye kṣāmā ca | tanvī bhaktiparā śive |
padminī sā tu vijñeyā | prasannā mṛgalocanā || (RA_2.24)
yasya tuṣṭo mahādevas | tasya siddho rasāyane |
tasya hi nirmalā buddhir | niścitā rasasādhane |
tasmādguruś ca śiṣyaś ca | pūrvoktaḥ siddhibhāgbhavet || (RA_2.27)
īdṛśair lakṣaṇaiḥ nārīṃ | kutaḥ prāpnoti sādhakaḥ |
yatra rūpaṃ mahādeva | lakṣaṇaṃ nātra vidyate || (RA_2.28)
lakṣaṇaṃ vidyate yatra | bhāvanā nātra vidyate |
śṛṇu devi paraṃ guhyaṃ | yat surair api durlabham |
lakṣamantraṃ japedyā tu | jāyate sā sulakṣaṇā |
baddhvā tu khecarīṃ mudrāṃ | japet pheṭkārabhairavīm || (RA_2.33)
mameyaṃ caṇḍikā mātā | janma ca tripurāntakāt |
kālikāhaṃ samudbhūtā- | smīdṛśaṃ saṃsmaret tu sā || (RA_2.34)
bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ ca | trailokye kathayet tu sā |
rasadīkṣāṃ tu pṛcchāmi | sādhakānāṃ hitāya vai || (RA_2.36)
śṛṇu bhairavi yadbhāvam | apūrvaṃ varṇayāmi te |
janā māheśvarā yatra | tatra sthāne tu kārayet || (RA_2.39)
kārayed vijane sthāne | paśuryatra na vidyate |
puṇye tithau muhūrte ca | lagne saumyagrahekṣite |
rasaliṅgaṃ nyasettatra | hemnā ca sahitaṃ priye |
oṃ hrīṃ śrīṃ sūtarājasya | mūlamantra udāhṛtaḥ || (RA_2.52)
caturasre tu dikpālān | pūjayitvā bahiḥ kramāt || (RA_2.53)
kumbhakarṇaṃ ca sugrīvaṃ | bhṛṅgīkaṃ ca dṛḍhāyudham || (RA_2.54)
dakṣiṇasyāṃ tato rudraṃ | pavanaṃ nairṛte tathā |
śivaṃ paścimabhāge tu | pāvakaṃ vāyave nyaset |
lepikā kṣepikā caiva | kṣārikā rañjikā tathā |
vibhūtiḥ khecarī caiva | daśa dūtyaḥ krameṇa ca |
pūjyāstvaṣṭadale padme | ūrdhvādhas tu daleṣu ca || (RA_2.58)
mālinī hemaśaktiś ca | parā śaktirbalā smṛtā |
madhye tāsāṃ ca śaktīnāṃ | sarvajñaṃ rasabhairavam |
raseśvarasya mantraṃ ca | kathyamānaṃ nibodha me || (RA_2.67)
oṃ hrīṃ krīṃ raseśvarāya mahākālāya mahābalāyāghorabhairavāya vajravīra krodhakaṅkāla kṣlauḥ kṣlaḥ || Ras_2.68 ||
vāgbhavaṃ bhuvaneśīṃ ca | śrībījaṃ ca sureśvari || (RA_2.72)
tarpayed annapānaiś ca | jāgaraṃ tatra kārayet |
sahasraṃ vā śataṃ vāpi | trisaṃdhyaṃ saṃjapedimām || (RA_2.88)
hastamātraṃ dvihastaṃ vā | taṇḍulair vimalair likhet || (RA_2.94)
nyaset krodhaṃ ca kaṅkālaṃ | mālāmantraiḥ samarcayet || (RA_2.97)
oṃ hrīṃ krauṃ kṣlaiṃ kṣlaṃ hrīṃ hrīṃ hrīṃ hrūḥ huṃ phaṭ raseśvarāya mahākālabhairavāya raudrarūpāya kṛṣṇapiṅgalalocanāya |
avatara 2 avatāraya 2 jalpa 2 jalpaya 2 śubhāśubhaṃ kathaya 2 kathāpaya 2 mahārakṣāṃ kuru 2 rasasiddhiṃ dehi |
tasyopari ghṛtadīpaṃ | vartīṃ mantraiś ca mantrayet || (RA_2.99)
samānīya kumārīṃ tu | kumāraṃ vā suśobhanam |
paśyanti devatā dīpe | kumārāś ca śubhāśubham |
saptajanma mṛto jāto | na tyajed rasabhāvanam || (RA_2.104)
aghoreṇa baliṃ dattvā | tataḥ karma samācaret || (RA_2.106)
drutikriyā tu vāruṇyāṃ | vāyavye dhamanaṃ priye |
āsanaṃ tu guror madhye | niveśya suranāyike |
sadyojātaṃ tasya jānu | vāmadevaṃ tu guhyakam || (RA_2.110)
aghoraṃ hṛdayaṃ tasya | vaktraṃ tatpuruṣaṃ smṛtam |
bindur deveśi tasyordhve | bindorūrdhve sthito nadaḥ |
śūnyaṃ śūnyaṃ punaḥ śūnyaṃ | triśūnyaṃ ca nirāmayam || (RA_2.114)
nabhaś ca gaganaṃ vyoma | khamākāśaṃ ca kevalam |
yadā ca niścalaṃ dhyāyet | yadā ca niścalaṃ manaḥ |
yadā ca calati dhyānaṃ | raso vahnau na tiṣṭhati || (RA_2.118)
sambhavanti tathā tattac | chāntyai ca vaṭukeśvaram |
sampūjya viniyuñjyāt tat | siddhadravyaṃ tu siddhidam || (RA_2.121)
siddhas tu nāśayed vādaṃ | taddeśaṃ tu parityajet |
rasaṃ na darśayed devi | nārīhaste na pātayet |
nāryai guhyaṃ na vaktavyaṃ | dravyaṃ tābhyo hi gopayet || (RA_2.124)
parānnaṃ naiva bhuñjīta | parāṃścaiva na viśvaset || (RA_2.125)
anena vidhinā yatra | pūjāṃ kurvanti sādhakāḥ |
na tatra rogadaurgatyaṃ | netayaḥ prabhavanti ca || (RA_2.129)
paścāt karma vidhātavyam | ātmanaḥ śubham icchatām || (RA_2.130)
anyathā kurute yas tu | tasya siddhir na jāyate |
apāyaḥ pāpaśaṅkā ca | buddhibhaṅgo hi jāyate || (RA_2.131)
avajñā rogajātaṃ ca | saṃdehaś ca pade pade |
ālasyād gurulobhāc ca | parasya kathanena ca |
utpannam api vijñānaṃ | haranti kulakāḥ priye || (RA_2.132)
tan mam ācakṣva deveśi | kim anyac chrotum icchasi || (RA_2.133)
pañcamaṃ tu gṛhaṃ devi | durlabhaṃ devadānavaiḥ || (RA_3.2)
yatra siddhir makārādiḥ | tiṣṭhate pañcame gṛhe || (RA_3.3)
liṅgāśrayaṃ yathā rūpaṃ | liṅgimāyā tu liṅginī |
gaganena tu sā jñeyā | bhagarekhā tu pañcame || (RA_3.4)
tataḥ siddhāś ca catvāraḥ | puruṣāṣṭādaśa smṛtāḥ |
anena mārjayet kṣetraṃ | rasendro yatra tiṣṭhati || (RA_3.12)
upalepaṃ tu tatraiva | caṇḍaghaṇṭāṃ tu kārayet |
pūrve gṛhe tu sā devī | caṇḍaghaṇṭā vyavasthitā || (RA_3.13)
tāḥ sarvāḥ kiṃkarāstasya | auṣadhaṃ peṣayanti tāḥ || (RA_3.18)
sā vidyā khecarīṇāṃ tu | nāmnāṃ tu kulakhecarī || (RA_3.19)
rājikāṃ saindhavaṃ nyasya | sā vidyā kulakhecarī |
guḍeṣṭakāṃ tu saṃmardya | priye tanmarditaṃ rasam || (RA_3.21)
kā kathā mantrarājasya | na vākyaṃ triśirasya ca |
ṣaḍaṅgaṃ yojayet tāṃ tu | tvaritaṃ dhārayet tataḥ || (RA_3.22)
caṇḍikāyā mahāmantraṃ | taṃ tu pātre niyojayet |
trikūṭākṣaṃ trinetraṃ tu | analasya tu vinyaset |
tadā tu sidhyate tasya | sādhakasya phalaṃ priye || (RA_3.28)
anye ye yoginīmantrāḥ | sarvānnārīś ca jāpayet || (RA_3.29)
kubjikādyāstu ye mantrā | mayā te saṃprakāśitāḥ |
trailokyaṃ kṣobhitāste tu | na manyante mama priye || (RA_3.31)
kiṃ karoti mahādeva | tāni me vaktumarhasi || (RA_4.1)
mukhe tiryakkṛte bhāṇḍe | rasaṃ sūtreṇa lambitam |
sthālikāyāṃ nidhāyordhvaṃ | sthālīm anyāṃ dṛḍhāṃ kuru |
saṃdhiṃ vilepayed yatnāt | mṛdā vastreṇa caiva hi || (RA_4.11)
evaṃ tu tridinaṃ kuryāt | tato yantraṃ vimocayet |
taptodake taptacullyāṃ | na kuryāc chītale kriyām || (RA_4.13)
na tatra kṣīyate sūto | na ca gacchati kutracit |
lohasya viṃśatirbhāgā | eko bhāgas tu gugguloḥ || (RA_4.17)
suślakṣṇaṃ peṣayitvā tu | toyaṃ dadyāt punaḥ punaḥ |
mūṣālepaṃ tataḥ kuryāt | tale piṣṭīṃ ca nikṣipet || (RA_4.18)
ahorātraṃ trirātraṃ vā | rasendro bhasmatāṃ vrajet || (RA_4.19)
ekānte tu kriyā kāryā | dṛṣṭān yair viphalā bhavet || (RA_4.24)
gandhakasya kṣayo nāsti | na rasasya kṣayo bhavet |
kṣayo yantrasya vijñeyaḥ | yantre vikriyate kriyā |
mahāgniṃ sahate hy eṣa | sārito yatra tiṣṭhati || (RA_4.27)
aparaṃ kharparaṃ tatra | śanair mṛdvagninā pacet || (RA_4.28)
pañcakṣāraistathā mūtrair | lavaṇaiś ca viḍaṃ tataḥ |
kṛṣṇā raktā ca pītā ca | śuklavarṇā ca mṛttikā |
ādyā śreṣṭhā kaniṣṭhāntyā | madhyamā madhyamā matā || (RA_4.30)
gārā dagdhā tuṣā dagdhā | dagdhā valmīkamṛttikā |
ajāśvānāṃ malaṃ dagdhaṃ | yāvattat kṛṣṇatāṃ gatam || (RA_4.32)
vāsakasya ca pattrāṇi | valmīkasya mṛdā saha |
mardayet tena badhnīyāt | vakranālaṃ ca koṣṭhikām || (RA_4.34)
gārā dagdhā tuṣā dagdhā | dagdhā valmīkamṛttikā |
prakāśā cāndhamūṣā ca | mūṣā tu dvividhā smṛtā || (RA_4.38)
āvartamāne kanake | pītā tāre sitā prabhā |
śaile tu dhūsarā devi | āyase kapilaprabhā || (RA_4.50)
na visphuliṅgo na ca budbudaś ca | yadā na rekhāpaṭalaṃ na śabdaḥ |
mūṣāgataṃ ratnasamaṃ sthiraṃ ca | tadā viśuddhaṃ pravadanti loham || (RA_4.52)
chādanaṃ tu pratīvāpaḥ | niṣekaṃ majjanaṃ viduḥ |
abhiṣekaṃ tadicchanti | snapanaṃ kriyate tu yat || (RA_4.53)
vāpo niṣekaḥ snapanaṃ | drute nirmalatāṃ gate |
uṣṇenaiva hi vāñchanti | śītalaṃ na ca vāñchati || (RA_4.54)
śukladīptiḥ saśabdaś ca | yadā vaiśvānaro bhavet |
lohāvartaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ | sattvaṃ patati nirmalam || (RA_4.55)
bakagalasamamānaṃ vaṅkanālaṃ vidheyaṃ | śuṣiranalinikā syānmṛnmayī dīrghavṛttā || Ras_4.58 ||
sa ca lohamayaḥ śailo | hy ayaskāntamayo 'thavā || (RA_4.60)
mantreṇa racayec chuddhiṃ | bhūmiṃ tenaiva śodhayet || (RA_4.61)
indhanāni ca sarvāṇi | dravyāṇi ca viśeṣataḥ |
dāhakaṃ jvālayet tena | khallaṃ tenaiva śodhayet || (RA_4.62)
rasaṃ viśodhayet tena | vinyaset divase śubhe |
tan mam ācakṣva deveśi | kim anyac chrotum icchasi || (RA_4.65)
yayā sampadyate hy eṣām | oṣadhīṃ vaktumarhasi || (RA_5.1)
tittiḍī kṣīriṇī rāsnā | meṣaśṛṅgī ca kukkuṭī || (RA_5.6)
kṛṣṇaparṇī ca tulasī | śvetā ca girikarṇikā |
śṛgālajihvā bṛhatī | vajrā cakrī ca rājikā || (RA_5.9)
kāñcanī vanarājī ca | kākamācī ca keśinī |
gojihvā kākajaṅghā ca | mahākālī ca śambarī |
sūryāvartaś ca kadalī | vandhyā kośātakī tathā |
doṣān haranti yogina | dhātūnāṃ pāradasya ca || (RA_5.23)
tāmbūlī nāginī brahmī | haṃsapādī ca lakṣaṇā |
bhūpāṭalī ca kaumārī | siṃhavallī ca śūkarī |
hemaparṇī paṭolī ca | nāgavallī ca bhṛṅgarāṭ |
ityaṣṭa mūlikāḥ proktāḥ | pañcaratnaṃ śṛṇu priye || (RA_5.27)
indirā ca kṣamāpālī | pañcamī tu niśācarī |
sauvarcalaṃ ca kācaṃ ca | lavaṇāḥ pañca kīrtitāḥ || (RA_5.32)
saktukaṃ kālakūṭaṃ ca | sitamustā tathaiva ca |
śṛṅgī kṛṣṇaviṣaṃ caiva | pañcaite tu mahāviṣāḥ || (RA_5.33)
pañcaivopaviṣā mukhyāḥ | tailāni hy uttamāni vai |
sarve malaharāḥ kṣārāḥ | sarve cāmlāḥ prabodhakāḥ |
kriyāṃ kurvanti tadyogāt | śaktayaś ca mahārasāḥ || (RA_5.44)
tan mam ācakṣva deveśi | kim anyac chrotum icchasi || (RA_5.45)
pītaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ tathā śuklaṃ | raktaṃ bhūmeś ca saṃgamāt || (RA_6.2)
pinākaṃ darduraṃ nāgaṃ | vajraṃ cābhraṃ caturvidham |
pināke 'gniṃ praviṣṭe tu | śabdaś ciṭiciṭir bhavet || (RA_6.4)
agniṃ praviṣṭaṃ nāgaṃ tu | phūtkāraṃ devi muñcati || (RA_6.5)
agniṃ praviṣṭaṃ vajraṃ tu | vajravattiṣṭhati priye || (RA_6.6)
nāgaṃ dehagataṃ nityaṃ | vyādhiṃ kuryād bhagaṃdaram || (RA_6.7)
rase rasāyane caiva | yojyaṃ vajrābhrakaṃ priye |
raktaṃ pītaṃ ca hemārthe | kṛṣṇaṃ hemaśarīrayoḥ |
tārakarmaṇi śuklaṃ ca | kācakiṭṭaṃ sadā tyajet || (RA_6.9)
piṇḍitaṃ vyoma niṣkledaṃ | dattvā sattvaṃ nirañjanam |
drāvayed gaganaṃ devi | lohāni sakalāni ca || (RA_6.20)
snuhikṣīreṇa saptāhaṃ | siktaṃ dhmātaṃ drutaṃ bhavet || (RA_6.24)
sthāpayen mṛnmaye pātre | tadbhavet salilaṃ yathā || (RA_6.25)
bhāvayec ca tathā tena | yāvaccūrṇaṃ tato bhavet || (RA_6.37)
abhrakasya yutaṃ cūrṇaṃ | dhmātaṃ mūṣāgataṃ dravat || (RA_6.39)
bhrāmakaṃ cumbakaṃ caiva | karṣakaṃ drāvakaṃ tathā |
pītaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ tathā raktaṃ | trivarṇaṃ syāt pṛthak pṛthak || (RA_6.41)
sparśavedhi bhavet pītaṃ | kṛṣṇaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ rasāyane |
bhrāmakaṃ tu kaniṣṭhaṃ syāt | cumbakaṃ madhyamaṃ priye |
cumbayec cumbakaṃ kāntaṃ | karṣayet karṣakaṃ priye || (RA_6.45)
rase rasāyane caiva | karṣakaṃ drāvakaṃ hitam || (RA_6.48)
kāntalohaṃ vinā sūto | dehe na krāmati kvacit |
na sūtena vinā kānto | na kāntaḥ sūtavarjitaḥ |
tenaiva kṣālanaṃ kāryyaṃ | pañcaniṣkaṃ tu ṭaṅkaṇam || (RA_6.59)
napuṃsakāḥ sattvahīnāḥ | kaṣṭaṃ lohe kramanti ca || (RA_6.72)
vīryyavantaś ca te jyeṣṭhā | nirmalā balavattarāḥ || (RA_6.74)
dravyakāro tathā vaiśyaḥ | śarīraṃ dṛḍhatāṃ nayet |
klībe klīvāḥ striyaḥ strīṇāṃ | sarbbeṣāṃ puruṣā hitāḥ || (RA_6.77)
yathā jātistathotsāhaṃ | yathā sattvaṃ tathā guṇān |
yathā rucistathā śīlaṃ | yathā śīlaṃ tathā varam |
yathā varastathā varṇaṃ | kurvanti kuliśāḥ priye || (RA_6.78)
vajrakaṃ cāpi vaikrāntaṃ | tanmadhye prakṣipet priye |
tīvrānale puṭaṃ dattvā | puṭāntaṃ yāvad āgatam || (RA_6.82)
lepaṃ mūṣodare dattvā | samāvarttaṃ tu kārayet |
gandhakaṃ ca śilādhātuṃ | bhrāmakasya mukhaṃ tathā |
śaśakasya ca dantāṃś ca | vetasāmlena peṣayat || (RA_6.87)
andhamūṣāgataṃ dhmātaṃ | vajraṃ tu mriyate kṣaṇāt || (RA_6.88)
tenaiva militaṃ vajraṃ | tārahemni na saṃśayaḥ || (RA_6.89)
mūṣālepagataṃ dhmātaṃ | vajraṃ tu mriyate kṣaṇāt || (RA_6.90)
tatkalkapuṭitaṃ dhmātaṃ | vajraṃ caiva mṛtaṃ bhavet || (RA_6.93)
tālena meṣaśṛṅgyā ca | vajravallyā ca veṣṭitam |
andhamūṣāgataṃ dhmātaṃ | vajraṃ tu mriyate kṣaṇāt || (RA_6.95)
peṭārī haṃsapādī ca | vajravallī ca sūraṇam |
kṣiptaṃ bahirmṛdā liptaṃ | mriyate saptabhiḥ puṭaiḥ || (RA_6.100)
veṣṭitaṃ kuliśaṃ devi | puṭapākāt mṛtaṃ bhavet || (RA_6.101)
bālā cātibalā caiva | gandhakaṃ karkaṭāsthi ca |
anena veṣṭitaṃ vajraṃ | mriyate saptabhiḥ puṭaiḥ || (RA_6.107)
tatkṣaṇānmriyate vajraṃ | tāre hemni na saṃśayaḥ || (RA_6.112)
tad vajraṃ jāyate khoṭaṃ | hemnā milati tatkṣaṇāt || (RA_6.113)
nāgavallyā praliptaṃ tu | tat pattreṇaiva veṣṭitam |
jānumadhye sthitaṃ yāmaṃ | mṛdu saṃjāyate dhruvam || (RA_6.114)
sukhādbandhakaraṃ hy āśu | sattvaṃ muñcati tatkṣaṇāt |
jalabhāṇḍe tu tat svinnaṃ | saptāhaṃ dravatāṃ vrajet || (RA_6.117)
dolāyāṃ svedayed devi | jāyate rasavad yathā || (RA_6.119)
mākṣikaṃ nīlapuṣpaṃ ca | pītaṃ marakataṃ mahat |
lohajātaṃ tathā dhmātam | agnivarṇaṃ tu dṛśyate |
vāpitaṃ sakṛd ekena | mṛtaṃ jalasamaṃ bhavet || (RA_6.121)
durgā bhagavatī devī | taṃ śūlena vyamardayat || (RA_6.124)
tasya raktaṃ tu patitaṃ | yatra yatra sthitaṃ bhuvi |
tatra tatra tu vaikrānto | vajrākāro mahārasaḥ || (RA_6.125)
vindhyasya dakṣiṇe cāsti | uttare nāsti sarvathā |
dehasiddhikaraḥ kṛṣṇaḥ | pīte pītaḥ site sitaḥ |
śeṣe dve niṣphale varjye | vaikrāntamiti saptadhā || (RA_6.128)
yatra kṣetre sthitaṃ devi | vaikrāntaṃ tatra bhairavam |
vandhyācūrṇaṃ tu vaikrāntaṃ | samāṃśena tu cūrṇayet |
andhanāle dhamitvā tu | mūṣāsattvaṃ tu jāyate || (RA_6.133)
māhiṣe navanīte ca | sakṣaudraṃ piṇḍitaṃ tataḥ |
suvarṇaṃ rajataṃ tāmraṃ | kāntalohasya vā rajaḥ |
tan mam ācakṣva deveśi | kim anyac chrotum icchasi || (RA_6.139)
iti śrīpārvatīparameśvarasaṃvāde rasārṇave rasasaṃhitāyām abhrakādilakṣaṇasaṃskāranirṇayo nāma ṣaṣṭhaḥ paṭalaḥ
vimalastrividho devi | śuklaḥ pītaś ca lohitaḥ || (RA_7.5)
mūṣāyāṃ muñcati dhmātaṃ | sattvaṃ śulvanibhaṃ mṛdu || (RA_7.10)
prakaṭāṃ mūṣikāṃ kṛtvā | dhamet sattvam apekṣitam || (RA_7.11)
vātāritailena puṭena tāpyaṃ | puṭena dagdhaṃ varaśuddhim eti || (RA_7.12)
mākṣikaṃ dinam ekaṃ tu | marditaṃ vaṭakīkṛtam |
lohapātre vinikṣipya | śodhayet tat tu yatnataḥ || (RA_7.21)
piṇḍaṃ baddhvā tu vidhivat | pātayec capalaṃ yathā || (RA_7.22)
gauraḥ śveto 'ruṇaḥ kṛṣṇaś | capalas tu praśasyate |
śeṣau madhyau ca lākṣāvat | śīghradrāvau tu niṣphalau |
vastreṇa baddhvā capalaṃ | laṅghayed yadi sāgaram |
vastraṃ ca veṣṭayet sadyaḥ | tenāsau capalaḥ smṛtaḥ || (RA_7.25)
kimatra citraṃ rasakaṃ rasena | rajasvalāyāḥ kusumena bhāvitam |
krameṇa kṛtvā uragena rañjitaṃ | karoti śulbaṃ tripuṭena kāñcanam || (RA_7.31)
rasakaṃ cūrṇayitvā tu | baddhvā vastre vicakṣaṇaḥ |
puṣpāṇāṃ raktapītānāṃ | rasaiḥ pattraiś ca bhāvayet || (RA_7.34)
kṣāraiḥ snehaistathā cāmlaiḥ | bhāvitaṃ rasakaṃ muhuḥ |
svayaṃ vinirgate cañcvoḥ | sasyako 'bhūt sa kālikaḥ || (RA_7.39)
rasāyane tu yogyaḥ syād | vayaḥstambhakaro bhavet || (RA_7.44)
sattvaṃ tu sūtasaṃkāśaṃ | jāyate nātra saṃśayaḥ || (RA_7.49)
kimatra citraṃ daradaḥ subhāvitaḥ | kṣīreṇa meṣyā bahuśo 'mlavargaiḥ |
bhāvitaṃ bahuśastac ca | kṣipraṃ badhnāti sūtakam || (RA_7.54)
rājāvartaś ca kaṅkuṣṭham | aṣṭā uparasāḥ smṛtāḥ || (RA_7.56)
tatra tyaktvā tu tadvāsaḥ | susnātā kṣīrasāgare || (RA_7.61)
evaṃ te śoṇitaṃ bhadre | praviṣṭaṃ kṣīrasāgare |
ye guṇāḥ pārade proktās | te caivātra bhavantviti || (RA_7.65)
iti devagaṇaiḥ prītaiḥ | purā proktaṃ sureśvari |
sa cāpi trividho devi | śukacañcunibho varaḥ |
kṣipraṃ bhṛṅgasya niryāse | kṣālito gandhako hitaḥ || (RA_7.71)
rase ca bhṛṅgarājasya | nimbukasya rase tathā |
tālakaḥ paṭalaḥ piṇḍo | dvidhā tatrādya uttamaḥ |
kuṣmāṇḍe tu śataṃ vārān | tālakaṃ svedayed budhaḥ || (RA_7.74)
ṭaṅkaṇaṃ ca yutair hyetaiḥ | tālakaṃ bhūdhare dravet || (RA_7.75)
dadyāt puṭaṃ gajākāraṃ | patet sattvaṃ sutālakāt || (RA_7.77)
raktā śilā tu gomāṃse | luṅgāmlena vipācitā |
tāṃ raktapītapuṣpāṇāṃ | rasaiḥ pittaiś ca bhāvayet || (RA_7.78)
sitā kṛṣṇā ca saurāṣṭrī | cūrṇakhaṇḍātmikā ca sā || (RA_7.79)
gopittena śataṃ vārān | saurāṣṭrīṃ bhāvayet tataḥ |
kāsīsaṃ trividhaṃ śuklaṃ | kṛṣṇaṃ pītamiti priye || (RA_7.81)
kramāt sitaṃ ca raktaṃ ca | sattvaṃ patati śobhanam || (RA_7.84)
kaṅkuṣṭhaṃ vidrumacchāyaṃ | tac ca sattvamayaṃ priye || (RA_7.88)
koṣṭhe kharāgninā dhmātāḥ | sattvaṃ muñcanti suvrate |
evaṃ śilābhyo jīvebhyo | mṛdbhyaḥ sattvaṃ prajāyate || (RA_7.95)
evaṃ coparasāḥ proktāḥ | śṛṇu lohānyataḥ param || (RA_7.96)
suvarṇaṃ rajataṃ tāmraṃ | tīkṣṇaṃ vaṅgaṃ bhujaṃgamam |
lohaṃ tu ṣaḍvidhaṃ tac ca | yathā pūrvaṃ tadakṣayam || (RA_7.97)
raktābhaṃ pītavarṇaṃ ca | dvividhaṃ devi kāñcanam |
dāhe raktaṃ sitaṃ chede | nikaṣe kuṅkumaprabham || (RA_7.100)
śuklaṃ ca tārakṛṣṇaṃ ca | dvividhaṃ rajataṃ priye |
tāmraṃ ca dvividhaṃ proktaṃ | raktaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ sureśvari |
tāmrapattraṃ ca nirguṇḍī- | rasamadhye tu ḍhālayet || (RA_7.106)
rohaṇaṃ vājaraṃ caiva | tṛtīyaṃ ca paḍālakam |
iti tīkṣṇaṃ tridhā tac ca | kāntalohamiti smṛtam || (RA_7.107)
śvetaṃ laghu mṛdu snigdham | uttamaṃ vaṅgamucyate || (RA_7.110)
vaṅgaṃ śuddhaṃ bhavet tadvat | nāgo nāgāsthimūtrataḥ || (RA_7.112)
niṣekaḥ sarvalohānāṃ | malaṃ hanti na saṃśayaḥ || (RA_7.117)
drāvayet kanakaṃ vāpāt | bhūyo na kaṭhinaṃ bhavet || (RA_7.118)
śoṣayet tasya vāpena | tīkṣṇaṃ mūṣāgataṃ dravet || (RA_7.122)
dhamed drutaṃ bhavelloham | etair eva niṣecayet |
lohalepaṃ tato dadyāt | agnisthaṃ dhārayet priye || (RA_7.129)
kadalī potakī dālī | kṣārameṣāṃ tu sādhayet || (RA_7.133)
ratnānāṃ drāvaṇaṃ vakṣye | gaganasya drutiṃ tathā || (RA_7.137)
balā cātibalā caiva | tṛtīyā ca mahābalā || (RA_7.138)
dhīrā sūraṇakandaś ca | kañcukī ca punarnavā |
ratnāni tena liptāni | tatkvāthasthaṃ dhamet punaḥ |
tair drutaiḥ sparśamātreṇa | kṣaṇād badhyeta sūtakaḥ || (RA_7.146)
na so 'sti lohamātaṃgo | yaṃ na gandhakakesarī |
haranti rogān sakalān | rasayuktāni kiṃ punaḥ |
nāgaṃ vaṅgaṃ suvīraṃ ca | dravyakarmaṇi yojayet || (RA_7.152)
paribālaṃ tu yallohaṃ | tathā ca malayodbhavam |
tan mam ācakṣva deveśi | kim anyac chrotum arhasi || (RA_7.154)

div.head: 8 [Bījasādhana]
div.l: rāgasaṃkhyāṃ tathā bīja- | sādhanaṃ ca vada prabho || (RA_8.1)
giridoṣe kṣayaṃ nīte | sūtakaṃ rañjayanti te || (RA_8.2)
vimalo gairikaṃ caiṣām | ekaikaṃ dviguṇaṃ bhavet || (RA_8.3)
bhrāmakādiṣu kānteṣv apy | ekadvitriguṇo hi saḥ |
dvādaśāgraṃ śataṃ pañca | nāge rāgā vyavasthitāḥ |
śatahīnaṃ sahasraṃ tu | vaṅge rāgā vyavasthitāḥ || (RA_8.7)
raktapītāś ca śuklāś ca | hemni rāgāś ca ṣoḍaśa || (RA_8.8)
mahānīle ca deveśi | te rāgā dviguṇāḥ sthitāḥ || (RA_8.9)
bhedayet sarvalohāni | yac ca kena na bhidyate |
tadvajraṃ tasya deveśi | rāgaṃ lakṣadvayaṃ viduḥ || (RA_8.12)
rāgasaṃkhyāṃ na jānāti | saṃkrāntasya rasasya tu |
mānavendraḥ prakurvīta | yo hi jānāti pārvati |
ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi | bījānāṃ sādhanaṃ priye |
kalpitaṃ rañjitaṃ pakvam | iti bhūyastridhā bhavet || (RA_8.17)
śuddhaṃ miśraṃ tu saṃyogāt | yathālābhaṃ sureśvari || (RA_8.19)
bhavet samarasaṃ garbhe | rasarājasya ca dravet || (RA_8.23)
vaṅgābhraṃ haritālaṃ ca | nāgābhre tu manaḥśilāḥ || (RA_8.30)
abhrakaṃ surasā śṛṅgaṃ | maṇḍūkasya vasā viṣam |
khasattvaṃ syānnibaddhaṃ ca | dṛḍhaṃ dhmātaṃ milettataḥ || (RA_8.39)
anyonyaṃ dvaṃdvatāṃ yānti | dravanti salilaṃ yathā || (RA_8.40)
vāpitaṃ sevitaṃ rakta- | gaṇaiḥ snehair mṛtaṃ tataḥ |
kevalaṃ vimalaṃ tāmraṃ | vāpitaṃ daradena ca |
kurute triguṇaṃ jīrṇaṃ | lākṣābhaṃ nirmalaṃ rasam || (RA_8.45)
kṛṣṇābhrakasya cūrṇaṃ ca | raktavargair muhuḥ puṭaiḥ || (RA_8.46)
tāpyena vā mṛtaṃ hema | triguṇena nivāpitam |
drutaṃ hemanibhaṃ sūtaṃ | kurute nātra saṃśayaḥ || (RA_8.48)
abhrakaṃ hema tāmraṃ ca | śilayā mākṣikeṇa ca |
gairikeṇa ca mukhyena | rasakena ca rañjayet || (RA_8.49)
tadeva śataśo rakta- | gaṇaiḥ snehair niṣecitam |
rasakaṃ vāpitaṃ śaśvac- | cūrṇitaṃ hemni vāhayet || (RA_8.58)
nāgo nirjīvatāṃ yāti | puṭayogaiḥ punaḥ punaḥ || (RA_8.59)
mṛtaṃ nāgaṃ mṛtaṃ vaṅgaṃ | śulvaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ ca vā mṛtam |
nirutthe pannage hemni | nirvyūḍhe śataśo gaṇe |
āvartitaṃ cūrṇitaṃ ca | māritaṃ saptabhiḥ puṭaiḥ || (RA_8.62)
vyūḍhe śataguṇe hemni | tadbījaṃ jārayet samam |
ūrdhvādho mākṣikaṃ dattvā | śulvaṃ hemasamaṃ bhavet |
mākṣikeṇa hataṃ tac ca | bīje nirvāhayet priye || (RA_8.65)
dvātriṃśadguṇitaṃ hemni | nāgaṃ tāpyaṃ hataṃ vahet |
nāgaḥ karoti mṛdutāṃ | nirvyūḍhastāṃ ca raktatām |
vāpitaṃ pītatāṃ tīkṣṇaṃ | kāntasthāṃ kālikāṃ viṣam || (RA_8.68)
puṭena nihataṃ kāryaṃ | vyūḍhaṃ tāraṃ tu vedhayet |
dvātriṃśatsadguṇaṃ tāre | vaṅge tāpyaṃ hataṃ vahet |
kuṭilaṃ vimalaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ | khasattvaṃ cāpi vāhayet |
bhāvitaṃ kharparasthaṃ ca | plāvayitvā punaḥ punaḥ |
tailaṃ vipācayed devi | tena bījāni rañjayet || (RA_8.81)
rasatulyaṃ yathā bījaṃ | gataṃ garbhadrutiṃ priye |
pakvaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ samaṃ garbhe | yaddravedrañjayec ca tam || (RA_8.87)
tan mam ācakṣva deveśi | kim anyac chrotum icchasi || (RA_8.88)

div.head: 9 [Viḍakathana]
div.l: bījānāṃ kalanaṃ proktaṃ | viśeṣeṇa ca sādhanam |
jāryante tāni yaiḥ sūte | tān viḍān vaktumarhasi || (RA_9.1)
śataśo vā plutaṃ cūrṇaṃ | gandhakasya gavāṃ jalaiḥ || (RA_9.4)
cūlikā gandhapāṣāṇaḥ | kāntasya ca mukhaṃ priye |
kṣārairmūtraiś ca vipaced | ayaṃ jvālāmukho viḍaḥ || (RA_9.8)
dagdhakāṇḍais tilānāṃ tu | pañcāṅgaṃ mūlakasya ca || (RA_9.11)
gandhakaṃ ca sitaṃ hiṅgu- | lavaṇāni ca ṣaṭ tathā |
saptāhaṃ bhūgataḥ paścād | dhānyasthaḥ pravaro viḍaḥ || (RA_9.14)
tan mam ācakṣva deveśi | kim anyac chrotum icchasi || (RA_9.19)

div.head: 10 [Rasaśodhana]
div.l: rasasya lakṣaṇaṃ kiṃvā | rasakarma ca kīdṛśam |
śakyate na mayā vaktuṃ | saṃkṣepāt kathyate śṛṇu || (RA_10.3)
raso rasendraḥ sūtaś ca | pāradaścātha miśrakaḥ || (RA_10.4)
nāśayet sakalān rogān | valīpalitam eva saḥ || (RA_10.5)
śarīre hemni kartā ca | jāraṇe sāraṇāsu ca || (RA_10.6)
īṣatpītaś ca rūkṣāṅgo | doṣayuktaś ca sūtakaḥ || (RA_10.7)
taṃ vidyāt pāradaṃ devi | tārakarmaṇi yojayet || (RA_10.8:1)
tathā hema śarīraṃ ca | pāradena vinaśyati || (RA_10.8:2)
svedanaṃ mardanaṃ caiva | cāraṇaṃ jāraṇaṃ tathā |
drāvaṇaṃ rañjanaṃ caiva | sāraṇaṃ krāmaṇaṃ kramāt |
iti yo vetti tattvena | tasya sidhyati sūtakaḥ || (RA_10.11)
tīvratvaṃ jāyate svedāt | amalatvaṃ ca mardanāt |
sa tāvajjīvayejjīvaṃ | tena jīvo rasaḥ smṛtaḥ || (RA_10.15)
catasro gatayo dṛśyā | adṛśyā pañcamī gatiḥ || (RA_10.16)
akampaś ca vikampaś ca | pañcāvasthā rasasya tu || (RA_10.18)
hema dattvā tataḥ śuddhaṃ | tat tu stambhen niyāmake |
niyamito na prayāti | tathā dhūmagatiṃ śive || (RA_10.21)
jāyate niścitaṃ bhadre | tadā tasya gatitrayam || (RA_10.23)
akṣīṇaṃ tu rasaṃ dṛṣṭvā | dadyādvyomādikaṃ tataḥ |
svedanaṃ ca tataḥ karma | dīyamānasya mardanam || (RA_10.25)
jīrṇaṃ jīrṇaṃ tu saṃraktaṃ | samahemnā tu sārayet |
krāmaṇena samāyuktaṃ | taṃ ca vedhe niyojayet || (RA_10.29)
āroṭaḥ pārado brahmā | mūrchitas tu janārdanaḥ |
pāradasya trayo doṣā | viṣaṃ vahnirmalas tathā |
viṣeṇa saviṣaṃ vidyāt | vahnau kuṣṭhī bhavennaraḥ |
ṣaṭtruṭyaścaikalikṣā syāt | ṣaḍlikṣā yūka eva ca |
ṣaḍrajaḥ sarṣapaḥ sākṣāt | siddhārthaḥ sa ca kīrtitaḥ |
māṣā dvādaśa tolaḥ syāt | aṣṭau tolāḥ palaṃ bhavet || (RA_10.35)
śubhasya tu sahasre dve | bhāra ekaḥ prakīrtitaḥ || (RA_10.36)
dve sahasre palānāṃ tu | sahasraṃ śatameva vā |
aṣṭāviṃśat palānāṃ tu | daśa pañcakameva vā || (RA_10.37)
tuṣavarje tu dhānyāmle | sarvaṃ saṃkṣubhya nikṣipet |
aṅkolas tu viṣaṃ hanti | vahnimāragvadhaḥ priye |
citrakas tu malaṃ hanyāt | kumārī saptakañcukam || (RA_10.43)
tasmād ebhiḥ samopetair | mardayet pātayed budhaḥ || (RA_10.44)
nirudgāre tu pāṣāṇe | mardayet pātayet punaḥ || (RA_10.46)
tadrasair marditaḥ pātyaḥ | saptadhā nirmalo bhavet || (RA_10.55)
rasaṃ niyāmake dadyāt | tejasvī nirmalo bhavet |
tan mam ācakṣva deveśi | kim anyac chrotum icchasi || (RA_10.61)

div.head: 11 [Bālajāraṇa]
div.l: lakṣaṇaṃ śodhanaṃ caiva | pāradasya śrutaṃ mayā |
yāvanna jāryate sūtaḥ | tāvat tu na ca nirvṛtiḥ || (RA_11.3)
khallas tu pīṭhikā devi | rasendro liṅgamucyate |
mardanaṃ vandanaṃ tasya | grāsaḥ pūjā vidhīyate || (RA_11.4)
yāvad dināni vahnistho | jāryate dhāryate rasaḥ |
dravanti tasya pāpāni | kurvannapi na lipyate || (RA_11.6)
garbhasthaṃ drāvayitvā tu | tato bāhyadrutiṃ dravet |
sitaṃ sitena dravyeṇa | raktaṃ raktena rañjayet || (RA_11.9)
sāraṇaṃ krāmaṇaṃ jñātvā | tato vedhaṃ prayojayet || (RA_11.10)
oṃ namo 'mṛtalohāya parāmṛtarasodbhavāya huṃ svāhā || Ras_11.11 ||
jāraṇaṃ kartumicchāmi | grāsaṃ gṛhṇa mama prabho || (RA_11.12)
ekaikaṃ trividhaṃ tac ca | tad vakṣyāmy ānupūrvaśaḥ || (RA_11.15)
nirmukho bhakṣayed devi | kṣaṇena gaganaṃ rasaḥ || (RA_11.16)
hemakarmaṇi hemaiva | tāre tāro mukhaṃ bhavet || (RA_11.17)
jāraṇārthaṃ ca bījānāṃ | vajrāṇāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ || (RA_11.20)
anena sakalaṃ devi | cāraṇāvas tu bhāvayet |
kṣārāmle bhāvitaṃ vyoma | rajasā prathamena ca || (RA_11.22)
śigruko yavaciñcā ca | bhāvitaṃ tadrasaiḥ kramāt || (RA_11.24)
navasāraṃ ca kāsīsaṃ | vacāṃ nimbaṃ tathaiva ca |
nidhāya tāmrapātre tu | gharṣayet tac ca suvrate |
navavāraṃ tato devi | lohapātre tu jārayet || (RA_11.35)
śanaiḥ śanair haṃsapādyā | dāpayec ca puṭatrayam || (RA_11.37)
pātayen mṛnmaye bhāṇḍe | rasena saha saṃyutam || (RA_11.38)
kalkena lepayet sūtaṃ | gaganaṃ ca tadūrdhvagam || (RA_11.39)
jāyate piṣṭikā śīghraṃ | nātra kāryā vicāraṇā || (RA_11.40)
tenābhrakaṃ tu saṃplāvya | bhūyobhūyaḥ puṭe dahet || (RA_11.42)
caturguṇaṃ vā dviguṇaṃ | samaṃ vā cārayet priye || (RA_11.45)
tṛtīyaḥ ṣoḍaśāṃśas tu | caturtho 'ṣṭāṃśa eva ca || (RA_11.50)
pañcamas tu caturthāṃśaḥ | ṣaṣṭho dvyaṃśaḥ prakīrtitaḥ |
hema tāraṃ ca saṃghṛṣya | khalle tatra rasaṃ nyaset |
hema sīsaṃ tu saṃghṛṣya | rasaṃ tatra pradāpayet |
tāraṃ vaṅgaṃ ca saṃghṛṣya | rasaṃ tatra pradāpayet |
samukhaṃ nirmukhaṃ vāpi | yatnataś cārayen nabhaḥ || (RA_11.59)
bahiś ca baddhaṃ vastreṇa | bhūyo grāsaṃ niveditam |
yantrād uddhṛtamātraṃ tu | lohapātre sthitaṃ rasam || (RA_11.62)
caturguṇena vastreṇa | pīḍito nirmalaś ca saḥ || (RA_11.64)
ajīrṇe pācayet piṣṭīṃ | svedayen mardayet tathā |
ṣoḍaśāṃśaiḥ sa dhānyāmlaiḥ | mardyaḥ svedyaś ca pāradaḥ || (RA_11.67)
nirmalīkaraṇārthaṃ tu | grāse grāse punaḥ punaḥ |
rasarāje yadā jīrṇaṃ | ṣaḍguṇaṃ gaganaṃ priye |
tadā grasati lohāni | tyajec ca gatimātmanaḥ || (RA_11.74)
sakampaś ca vikampaś ca | pañcāvasthā rasasya tu || (RA_11.75)
vṛddhas tu ṣaḍguṇaṃ jīrṇaḥ | kuryāt karma pṛthak pṛthak || (RA_11.77)
kumāras tu raso devi | na samartho rasāyane |
yauvanastho raso devi | kṣamo dehasya rakṣaṇe || (RA_11.79)
jarāvastho raso yaś ca | dehe lohena saṃkramet |
kāntasya cāpyabhāve tu | tīkṣṇalohaṃ tu dāpayet |
agniko yavaciñcā ca | vasuhaṭṭaś ca rāgiṇī |
sauvarcalaṃ ca kāsīsaṃ | sāmudraṃ saindhavaṃ tathā || (RA_11.87)
viḍacūrṇaṃ tato dattvā | kanakaṃ jārayet priye || (RA_11.89)
śṛṇu devi pravakṣyāmi | bhūcarākhyaṃ tu jāraṇam || (RA_11.90)
kṛṣṇaṃ pītaṃ raktamabhraṃ | śulve tīkṣṇe ca melayet || (RA_11.91)
śulve tīkṣṇaṃ yadā cūrṇaṃ | dvāviṃśatiguṇaṃ priye |
gandhanāgaṃ tato 'rdhaṃ tu | krameṇaiva tu melayet || (RA_11.92)
hemnā tu saha dātavyaṃ | sūtakaikena ṣoḍaśa |
gandhanāgaṃ yadā jīrṇaṃ | tadā baddho bhavedrasaḥ |
puṭena mārayec chuddhaṃ | hema dadyāt tu ṣaḍguṇam || (RA_11.94)
sūtake hemabījaṃ ca | yadā jīrṇaṃ caturguṇam |
bhūcarī jāraṇā proktā | khecarīṃ jāraṇāṃ śṛṇu || (RA_11.98)
katakaṃ kanakaṃ caivam | ekīkṛtya ca mardayet |
padmarāgaṃ prayatnena | rase grāsaṃ tu dāpayet || (RA_11.101)
mūrchāṅgadāhaś ca tato | jāyate nātra saṃśayaḥ |
devāś ca yatra līyante | siddhastatraiva līyate || (RA_11.107)
samaṃ kṛṣṇābhrasattvaṃ ca | rasakaṃ cāṣṭakaṃ guṇam || (RA_11.110)
tataḥ siddhaṃ vijānīyāt | dvaidhaṃ śulvasya dāpayet |
bhūrje dattvā tato deyaṃ | dolāyantre vinikṣipet || (RA_11.115)
tamuddhṛtya rasaṃ devi | khalle saṃmardayet tataḥ || (RA_11.116)
mardayitvābhrake piṇḍaṃ | kṣiptvā tatra puṭaṃ dadet |
tato garbhe patatyāśu | jārayet tat sukhena tu || (RA_11.118)
tṛtīye divase sūto | jarate grasate tataḥ || (RA_11.119)
aṣṭāṃśena tato grāsaṃ | garbhadrāvaṃ ca pūrvavat |
puṭet tu jāritastāvat | yāvat kando na dahyate || (RA_11.122)
pādāṃśena tu mūṣāyā | grāsaḥ sūte vidhīyate |
pūrvavac ca viḍaṃ dadyāt | garbhadrāvaṇameva ca || (RA_11.123)
evaṃ caturguṇe jīrṇe | sūtako balavān bhavet |
tataḥ śalākayā grāsān | agnistho grasate rasaḥ || (RA_11.124)
abhrakaṃ bhrāmakaṃ caiva | śaṅkhanābhiṃ tathaiva ca |
tāvattaṃ mardayet prājño | yāvat karma dṛḍhaṃ bhavet || (RA_11.128)
gṛhyate ko 'tra saṃdeho | yathā tīvre hutāśane || (RA_11.130)
kuliśena puṭe dagdhe | karṣvagnau tena mardayet |
muktāphalaṃ tato deyaṃ | vajrajīrṇe tu sūtake || (RA_11.132)
pārśvajyotiḥ pradṛśyeta | cordhvaṃ naiva tu dṛśyate |
bhūcaraṃ taṃ vijānīyāt | rasendraṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ || (RA_11.142)
samajīrṇena vajreṇa | hemnā ca sahitena ca |
sārayet tena bījena | sahasram api vedhayet |
sāritaṃ jārayet paścāt | lepyaṃ kṣepyaṃ sahasraśaḥ || (RA_11.146)
kevalaṃ tu yadā vajraṃ | samajīrṇaṃ tu jārayet |
agnistho jāyate sūtaḥ | śalākāṃ grasate kṣaṇāt |
mūṣāsthaṃ dhamayet sūtaṃ | haṭhāgnau naiva kampate || (RA_11.150)
lohāni sattvaṃ triguṇaṃ | dviguṇaṃ kanakaṃ tathā |
sarvaṃ ca jārayed vajraṃ | tadāsau khecaro rasaḥ |
same tu pannage jīrṇe | daśavedhī bhavedrasaḥ |
dviguṇe śatavedhī syāt | triguṇe tu sahasrakam || (RA_11.155)
kuṭilaṃ pannagaṃ jāryaṃ | tatra saṃkhyākrameṇa tu |
tatra mayā kṣaṇaṃ dhyātvā | dṛṣṭvā tanmāyayā kṛtam |
jāritaṃ pannage sūtaṃ | samāṃśaṃ śilayā hatam || (RA_11.160)
hema śulvaṃ tathā tīkṣṇaṃ | vājaraṃ ca paḍālakam |
gandhanāge drute devi | jāraṇāṃ sukarāṃ śṛṇu || (RA_11.163)
nāgasya mūtre deveśi | vatsasya mahiṣasya vā |
ūrdhvaṃ gandhakacūrṇaṃ ca | tato nāgadalaṃ tathā || (RA_11.168)
ūrdhvaṃ prasārya saṃsthāpya | sūtrair vartiṃ tu kārayet || (RA_11.169)
dīptāgrabhāgāṃ tāṃ vartiṃ | saṇḍaśyā tu vidhārayet || (RA_11.170)
kācakūpyāś ca madhye tu | tattailaṃ sthāpayet priye || (RA_11.171)
caturbindūn puṭe prāgvad | evaṃ pratidinaṃ bhavet || (RA_11.174)
kalkena liptaṃ puṭitaṃ | bījaṃ garbhe drutaṃ bhavet || (RA_11.178)
bīje pādārdhatulyāṃśe | jīrṇe vedhaṃ karoti saḥ |
ataḥ paraṃ tu saṃskāraṃ | vakṣye nāgābhrajāraṇam |
rasakasya ca bhāgāṃs trīn | bhāgaikaṃ daradasya ca |
taṃ nāgaṃ dhamayed evaṃ | saptadhā hemavadbhavet || (RA_11.184)
pītābhrakaṃ tv ekadalaṃ | liptāyāṃ maricena tu |
mardayet tridinaṃ sūtaṃ | dolāyāṃ svedayet tryaham || (RA_11.188)
tridine kacchape jāryam | evaṃ jāryaṃ tu ṣaḍguṇam || (RA_11.191)
dhameddinatrayaṃ mandaṃ | yāvad bījaṃ drutaṃ bhavet |
tameva samajīrṇaṃ tu | vahnau niṣkampanaṃ rasam || (RA_11.195)
mūrchito mṛtasūtaś ca | jalūkābandha eva ca |
caturtho mūrtibandhas tu | paṭṭabandhas tu pañcamaḥ |
bhasmasūtaś ca khoṭaś ca | saṃskārāt saptadhā rasaḥ || (RA_11.198)
lakṣaṇaṃ dṛśyate yasya | mūrchitaṃ taṃ vadanti hi || (RA_11.199)
nānāvarṇaṃ tathā svacchaṃ | drutaṃ yonau jalūkavat |
śvetaṃ pītaṃ guru tathā | mṛdu sikthakasaṃnibham |
kṛṣṇaṃ śvetaṃ tathā pītaṃ | nīlaṃ bhasmanibhaṃ tathā |
athavā chedane snigdhaṃ | raśminā mṛdunā dravet |
khoṭādayas tu ye pañca | vihāya jalukākṛti |
haṭhāgnau dhāmitāḥ santi | na tiṣṭhatyeva mūrchitaḥ || (RA_11.208)
rañjanaṃ ca tato devi | jāraṇā cānusāraṇā |
krāmaṇaṃ ca tato deyaṃ | sūtakasya vicakṣaṇaiḥ || (RA_11.212)
evaṃ kramaṃ tu yo vetti | tasya siddhirna saṃśayaḥ || (RA_11.213)
vedhakaṃ yas tu jānāti | dehe lohe rasāyane |
tasya janma jarā vyādhir | naśyatyeva na saṃśayaḥ || (RA_11.214)
dehe tu pañcaratnāni | nāgaṃ vaṅgaṃ tathāyasam |
tasya tu krāmaṇaṃ jñātvā | tato vaidyair upācaret |
krāmaṇena vinā sūto | na kramet na ca vedhayet |
dehalohāmayān sarvān | vṛthā syāt kevalaṃ śramaḥ || (RA_11.217)
yasya rogasya yo yogas | tenaiva saha yojayet |
oṣadhyā ghātitaḥ sūto | yathā bhūyo na jīvati || (RA_11.220)
tan mam ācakṣva deveśi | kim anyac chrotum icchasi || (RA_11.221)
kena vā bhasmasūtaḥ syāt | kena vā khoṭabandhanam || (RA_12.1)
adho niṣpīḍitaṃ devi | raso bhavati cottamaḥ || (RA_12.4)
rasaṃ saṃmardya tenaiva | dināni trīṇi vārttikaḥ |
āroṭaṃ bandhayet kṣipraṃ | gaganaṃ tatra jārayet || (RA_12.5)
yantre vidyādhare devi | gaganaṃ tatra jārayet || (RA_12.6)
māsamātreṇa deveśi | jīryate tat samaṃ same |
bhāvayet saptavāraṃ tu | dvipadyāś ca rasena tu || (RA_12.8)
punas taṃ gandhakaṃ dattvā | pattralepe raviṃ haret |
taṃ raviṃ tāramadhye tu | triguṇaṃ vāhayet tataḥ || (RA_12.10)
punas taṃ gandhakaṃ sākṣād | drāvayitvā drutaṃ kuru || (RA_12.11)
rasendraṃ mardayet tena | gatadehaṃ tu kārayet |
arśo bhagaṃdaraṃ lūtāṃ | śirorogāṃś ca nāśayet || (RA_12.12)
tenaiva ghātayed vaṅgaṃ | vaṅgaṃ tāre tu nirvahet || (RA_12.13)
taṃ tāraṃ jārayet sūte | tatsūtaṃ bandhanaṃ vrajet |
śulvaṃ tu dāpayet tāre | tattāraṃ kāñcanaṃ bhavet |
palāni daśa cūrṇasya | rasair dhātryāstu bhāvayet || (RA_12.16)
valkalaṃ sūkṣmacūrṇaṃ tu | madhunā sahitaṃ lihet |
tena tailena deveśi | rasaṃ saṃkocayed budhaḥ || (RA_12.21)
tattāreṇa samaṃ bāhyaṃ | tena siktaṃ tu vāpitam |
daśāṃśaṃ vedhayet sūtaṃ | daśa pītaṃ śatena ca || (RA_12.25)
daśāṃśaṃ koṭivedhi syāt | koṭivedhi samena ca || (RA_12.26)
lakṣavedhī rasaḥ sākṣād | aṣṭau lohāni kāñcanam || (RA_12.30)
naṣṭacchāyo hy adṛśyaś ca | trailokyaṃ ca bhramedrasaiḥ || (RA_12.33)
anena ghātayet sūtaṃ | pañcāvasthaṃ kuru priye || (RA_12.34)
mṛtasya dāpayen nasyaṃ | hastapādau tu mardayet |
tāre tāmre 'pi vā devi | bhāvayet taṃ manaḥśilām || (RA_12.38)
nirgandhā jāyate sā tu | ghātayet tadrasāyanam |
tāre tāmre 'pi vā devi | koṭivedhī bhavedrasaḥ || (RA_12.40)
jīryate gaganaṃ devi | nirmukhaṃ ca varānane |
drāvayed gaganaṃ devi | tīkṣṇaṃ lohaṃ ca pannagam || (RA_12.42)
svarase mardayet paścāt | pannagaṃ devi secayet || (RA_12.44)
ravighṛṣṭaṃ tu taṃ devi | pannagaṃ triguṇaṃ priye || (RA_12.45)
tadbhasma tāmrapiṣṭaṃ tu | triguṇaṃ tena nirvahet || (RA_12.48)
tārahema samāṃśaṃ tu | dviguṇaṃ pittalaṃ bhavet || (RA_12.49)
taṃ rasaṃ rasakaṃ caiva | tīkṣṇaṃ lohaṃ ca pannagam || (RA_12.50:1)
tīkṣṇaṃ nāgaṃ tathā śulvaṃ | rasakena tu rañjayet |
dvitīye vāsare prāpte | vajraratnaṃ tu ghātayet |
daśavāraṃ niṣiktaṃ tu | bhasmākāraṃ hi jāyate || (RA_12.55)
koṭivedhī raso devi | lohānyaṣṭau ca vidhyati || (RA_12.57)
sabījā cauṣadhī grāhyā | kācid gulmalatā priye |
tasya tailasya madhye tu | prakṣipet khecarīrasam |
baddhvā poṭalikāṃ tena | gaganaṃ tena jārayet |
same tu gagane jīrṇe | baddhastiṣṭhati sūtakaḥ || (RA_12.62)
dviguṇe gagane jīrṇe | aṣṭau lohāni saṃharet || (RA_12.64)
jārayed gandhakaṃ sā tu | jārayet sāpi tālakam || (RA_12.66)
kāñcanaṃ jārayet sāpi | rasendraṃ sā ca baddhayet |
pravālaṃ jārayet sā tu | gaganaṃ drāvayet tathā |
vajraṃ ca ghātayet sā tu | sarvasattvaṃ ca pātayet || (RA_12.67)
same tu kanake jīrṇe | daśakoṭīstu vedhayet || (RA_12.69)
saptame dhūmavedhī syāt | aṣṭame tv avalokataḥ |
navame śabdavedhī syād | ata ūrdhvaṃ na vidyate || (RA_12.70)
tṛṇauṣadhyā rase sūtaṃ | naiva baddhaṃ kadācana |
akṣayaṃ ca varārohe | vahnimadhye na tiṣṭhati || (RA_12.75)
na khoṭo na ca vā bhasma | naiva dravyaṃ karoti saḥ |
kiṃ tat dravyaṃ prakurvīta | dhāmyamāno na tiṣṭhati || (RA_12.76)
pattre pāke kaṭe chede | naiva tiṣṭhati kāñcane |
na vedhaṃ ca śatād ūrdhvaṃ | karoti sa rasaḥ priye || (RA_12.77)
yāvanna baddhamekaṃ tu | vikrītaṃ tat tu kāñcanam |
dharmārthakāmamokṣārthaṃ | naiva dadyāt tu tat priye || (RA_12.78)
nirjīvatvaṃ gataḥ sūtaḥ | kathaṃ jīvaṃ dadāti ca |
nirjīvena tu nirjīvaḥ | kathaṃ jīvati śaṃkara || (RA_12.79)
divyauṣadhyā yadā devi | rasendro mūrchito bhavet |
aṣṭānāṃ caiva lohānāṃ | malaṃ śamayati kṣaṇāt || (RA_12.81)
mahāmūrchāgataṃ sūtaṃ | ko vāpi kathayen mṛtam |
kṣmāpālena hataṃ vajram | anenaiva tu kāñcanam |
bhakṣitaḥ sa raso yena | so 'pi sākṣāt sadāśivaḥ |
veṣṭayed vṛścikālyā ca | tatpiṇḍaṃ lepayet tataḥ |
vṛścikālyā ca tat pattraṃ | lepitaṃ veṣṭayet tataḥ || (RA_12.94)
gajendrākhyaṃ puṭaṃ dattvā | saptadhā baddhatāṃ nayet || (RA_12.101)
bhakṣayet taṃ rasaṃ prājñaḥ | ṣaṇmāsādamaro bhavet || (RA_12.102)
haṃsāṅghriṃ śukatuṇḍīṃ ca | gṛhītvā mardayed rasam |
tasyā mūle tu nikṣiptaṃ | kṣīraṃ raktaṃ bhavet priye || (RA_12.109)
ekameva bhavennālaṃ | tasya roma tu veṣṭanam || (RA_12.112)
tasyāgre ca bhavet puṣpaṃ | śukatuṇḍasya saṃnibham |
tathā śulvasya pattrāṇi | vedhyaṃ jāmbunadaṃ bhavet || (RA_12.119:1)
padminīsadṛśī pattraiḥ | puṣpair api ca tādṛśī |
bhaṅge caiva bhavet kṣīraṃ | raktavarṇaṃ suśobhanam || (RA_12.123)
mardayet saptarātraṃ tu | tena śulvaṃ ca vedhayet |
tasyāḥ pañcāṅgam ādāya | bhāvayet tu manaḥśilām |
